ComicInfo.Title: Knights of the Round Table
ComicInfo.Summary:
Skye takes on the Red Knight, but there is someone pulling his strings! A classic Grimm Fairy Tales villain makes her return! Will Skye be able to survive this new threat?!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Geebo Vigonte & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Sean Chen & Ivan Nunes | 2 | C | Cover C | Alfredo Reyes & Ylenia Di Napoli | 3 | D | Cover D | Jason Metcalf & Mohan Sivakami | 4 | E | Cosplay Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 350 | Sabine Rich | Missing | F | Baltimore Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | G | Baltimore Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 75 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | H | New York Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 50 | Elias Chatzoudis | Missing | I | In-Store Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Keith Garvey | Missing |
